column5: Can any one tell how late the border crossing stays open next Fri night 9-29-00. I think they close early at Bowbell, ND.Going to Tobin for week.Thanks Jimbo
You'll be there for the Vanity Cup days...will you compete?? I'm headed there the 6th -14th---would appreciate your comments on the bite/etc----e-mail OK...THANKS, Mike
